member.name: T:ILMerge.IncludeAssembliesAttribute
member.summary: A regular expression matching the assembly names to include in merging.

member.name: M:ILMerge.IncludeAssembliesAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:ILMerge.IncludeAssembliesAttribute.Pattern
member.summary: Gets the regular expression pattern.

member.name: T:ILMerge.ExcludeAssembliesAttribute
member.summary: A regular expression matching the assembly names to exclude from merging.

member.name: M:ILMerge.ExcludeAssembliesAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:ILMerge.ExcludeAssembliesAttribute.Pattern
member.summary: Gets the regular expression pattern.

member.name: T:ILMerge.IncludeResourcesAttribute
member.summary: A regular expression matching the resource names to include in merging.

member.name: M:ILMerge.IncludeResourcesAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:ILMerge.IncludeResourcesAttribute.Pattern
member.summary: Gets the regular expression pattern.

member.name: T:ILMerge.ExcludeResourcesAttribute
member.summary: A regular expression matching the resource names to exclude from merging.

member.name: M:ILMerge.ExcludeResourcesAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:ILMerge.ExcludeResourcesAttribute.Pattern
member.summary: Gets the regular expression pattern.

member.name: T:ILMerge.HideImportedTypesAttribute
member.summary: A switch to control whether the imported types are hidden (made private) or keep their visibility unchanged. Default is 'true'

member.name: M:ILMerge.HideImportedTypesAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: if set to true, imported types are hidden (private/internal).

member.name: P:ILMerge.HideImportedTypesAttribute.Value
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether imported types are hidden (private/internal).

member.name: T:ILMerge.NamespacePrefixAttribute
member.summary: A string that is used as prefix for the namespace of the imported types..

member.name: M:ILMerge.NamespacePrefixAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:ILMerge.NamespacePrefixAttribute.Prefix
member.summary: Gets the regular expression pattern.

member.name: T:ILMerge.FullImportAttribute
member.summary: A switch to control whether to import the full assemblies or only the referenced types. Default is 'false'

member.name: M:ILMerge.FullImportAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: if set to true, all types of the referenced assemblies are imported.

member.name: P:ILMerge.FullImportAttribute.Value
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether imported types are hidden (private/internal).
